definition: refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Cold store is used to control temperature of strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 控制溫度一般通過冷藏庫實現。

sentences.english: Skilled in the repair and maintenance of refrigeration systems and cold rooms.
sentences.chinese: 精通冷凍系統和冷藏室的維修和保養工作。

sentences.english: Fill an ice tray with water and stick it in the icebox.
sentences.chinese: 把水倒入冰盤，放入冷藏室。

sentences.english: Shenyang Refrigerator Cars licensing unit series.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽牌冷藏車製冷機組系列。

sentences.english: Apart from these full containers; there are 25 empty reefers for North Ameirica.
sentences.chinese: 除了這些重箱之外，還有25個空冷藏箱運往北美。

sentences.english: Getting out of bed in the morning was like stepping into a meat locker.
sentences.chinese: 早上鑽出被窩像是進了冷藏櫃。

sentences.english: Fresh kept in cold storage at -18℃ (Minus18DegreeCentigrade).
Spoon the mousse in the glasses. Frozen until set.
sentences.chinese: 把慕斯分盛在杯子裏，冷藏至凝固。

sentences.english: Chill in the refrigerator until set.
We bought a small cooler for the picnic.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲這次野餐買了個小冷藏箱。

sentences.english: Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 蓋蓋放冰箱冷藏至少2小時。

sentences.english: Wrap each blob in plastic wrap and refrigerate.
sentences.chinese: 將每份雜糧團用塑料袋包裝並放入冰箱冷藏。

sentences.english: Raw eggs are highly perishable and must be chilled before and after cooking.
sentences.chinese: 生雞蛋非常容易變質，烹製前後必須冷藏。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the contamination status of foods by L. monocytogenes.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解冷藏冷凍食品中李斯特菌污染狀況。

sentences.english: Please cut off the power and unplug the reefers before discharging.
sentences.chinese: 卸貨前請切斷電源，拔下冷藏箱的插頭。

sentences.english: A depot that can handle frozen, chilled and non-temperature controlled products.
sentences.chinese: 存放冷凍，冷藏以及無需溫控商品的倉庫。

definition: marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
